Dark_Blast.display_help: A long range blast of dark energy. Deals moderate Negative Energy damage and reduces the target's chance to hit. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Dark_Blast.display_target_help: The Dark Blast has reduced your chance to hit.

Smite.display_help: You wrap your fists with Negative Energy channeled from the Netherworld and Smite your foe with a powerful blow. Smite clouds the target's vision, lowering their chance to hit for a short time. Damage: High Recharge: Moderate
Smite.display_target_help: The Smite has reduced your chance to hit.

Gloom.display_help: Gloom slowly drains a target of life, while reducing their chance to hit. Slower than Dark Blast, but deals more damage over time. Damage: High(DoT), Recharge: Moderate
Gloom.display_target_help: The Gloom is causing damage to you and reducing your chance to hit.

Night_Fall.display_help: Unleashes a cone shaped burst of particles from the Netherworld. All targets within the modest range of this power take Negative Energy damage and have a reduced chance to hit. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Night_Fall.display_target_help: Night Fall has reduced your chance to hit.

Gather_Shadows.display_help: By collecting shadows from your surroundings you boost your damage and the secondary effects of your powers. Your powers' effects like Heals, Defense Buffs, Endurance Drains, Disorients, Holds, Immobilizes, Knockbacks and more, are all improved. The effects of Gather Shadows last a short while, and only the next couple of attacks will be boosted. Recharge: Long

Moonbeam.display_help: You release a burst of negative energy to foes around you dealing moderate Negative Energy damage, reducing their chance to hit and sapping their health over time. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Long
Moonbeam.display_short_help: PBAoE, Moderate DMG(Negative), Foe -To Hit, Minor DoT(Negative)
Moonbeam.display_target_help: The Engulfing Darkness is causing minor Negative Energy over time and reducing your chance to hit!

Life_Drain.display_help: You can tap the power of the Netherworld to steal some life from a target foe and reduce their chance to hit. Some of that stolen life is transferred to you in the form of Hit Points. Damage: High Recharge: Moderate
Life_Drain.display_short_help: Ranged, High DMG(Negative), Target -To Hit, Self +HP
Life_Drain.display_target_help: Your chance to hit has been reduced by the Life Drain.

Death_Shroud.display_help: An extremely long range and accurate beam of Negative Energy that deals tremendous damage and reduces the target's chance to hit. This is a sniper attack, and is best fired from a distance, as it can be interrupted. If you are engaged in battle this attack becomes instant-cast. If you are not engaged, it will do bonus damage. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow
Death_Shroud.display_target_help: The Moonbeam has reduced your chance to hit.

Midnight_Grasp.display_help: Mastery over the forces of the Netherworld allows you to create dark tentacles that can Immobilize a foe, reduce their chance to hit and continuously drain their life force. Damage: Superior(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Midnight_Grasp.display_short_help: Melee, Superior DMG(Negative), Foe Immobilize, -To Hit
Midnight_Grasp.display_target_help: The dark tentacles of the Midnight Grasp are holding you immobile. Your chance to hit is reduced.

Stone_Spears.display_help: Stone Spears erupt from the ground at the feet of your target. This attack can only be used against targets on the ground, and does moderate lethal damage. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Stone_Spears.display_short_help: Ranged, Moderate DMG(Lethal), Foe Knock Up

Stone_Mallet.display_help: Your control over the earth allows you to form a mallet of solid stone. This Stone Mallet deals heavy damage, and can knock down weak foes. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

Tremor.display_help: You can cause a localized earthquake immediately around you. This will deal moderate damage to every foe in melee range, while knocking them back. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

Hurl_Boulder.display_help: You are able to tear up a chunk of ground beneath your feet and Hurl it at an enemy. This attack deals moderate damage, and can knock foes back and even drop them out of the air if they are flying. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Hurl_Boulder.display_target_help: You have been hit by a Hurled Boulder and cannot fly.

Power_Boost.display_help: Boosts the damage and secondary effects of your powers. Your powers' effects like Heals, Defense Buffs, Endurance Drains, Disorients, Holds, Immobilizes and more, are all improved. The effects of Power Up last a short while, and only the next couple of attacks will be boosted. Recharge: Long

Heavy_Mallet.display_help: A more impressive form of Stone Mallet, the Heavy Mallet deals more damage, but is slower to swing. It has a greater chance of knocking down opponents. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow

Seismic_Smash.display_help: This massive attack hits with all the force of the Earth itself. It deals tremendous amounts of damage, and may Hold the target if they are not defeated outright. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow
Seismic_Smash.display_target_help: You have been immobilized by the crushing earth.

Mud_Pots.display_help: While this power is active, you draw upon the geothermal power of the Earth to create a bubbling pool of hot mud around yourself. All foes in melee range will become snared and entrapped in the mud, Immobilizing some and slowing others. The boiling heat from Mud Pots may also deal some damage over time to the snared foes. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Fast
Mud_Pots.display_short_help: Toggle: PBAoE, Minor DoT(Fire), Foe Immobilize, -SPD
Mud_Pots.display_target_help: The Mud Pots are burning you and reducing your Running speed. You may be immobilized, as well.

Fissure.display_help: This powerful stomp can crack the earth itself, damaging a nearby targeted foe and any foes around it. This Fissure can only affect foes on the ground, dealing moderate smashing damage and possibly throwing them into the air or disorienting them. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Fissure.display_short_help: Close (Targeted AoE), Moderate DMG(Smash), Foe Knockback, Disorient

Electric_Fence.display_help: You can quickly hurl small bolts of electricity at foes, dealing some damage and draining some Endurance. Some of this Endurance may transfer back to you. Charged Bolts deals light damage but recharges quickly. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

Charged_Brawl.display_help: Your fists become electrically charged and deliver a powerful punch. Charged Brawl can drain some Endurance from the target and may overload their synapses, leaving it writhing for a moment. A portion of drained Endurance may be returned to you. Disturbing an overloaded target will disperse the electrical charge and release the target Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Charged_Brawl.display_target_help: You have been put to sleep by the Charged Brawl attack.

Lightning_Field.display_help: You can send a large blast of electrical energy at a foe, dealing high damage and draining some Endurance. Some of this Endurance may transfer back to you. Lightning Bolt deals more damage than Charged Bolts, but recharges more slowly. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

Havok_Punch.display_help: The Havoc Punch is a slower attack than Charged Brawl, but makes up for it with greater damage and a chance to knock the target off their feet. Havoc Punch can drain some Endurance from your target and may overload its synapses, leaving them writhing for a moment. A portion of the drained Endurance may be given back to you. Disturbing an overloaded target will disperse the electrical charge and release him. Damage: High Recharge: Moderate
Havok_Punch.display_short_help: Melee, High DMG(Smash/Energy), Foe Sleep, -End, Knock Back
Havok_Punch.display_target_help: You have been put to sleep by the Havok Punch.

Build_Up.display_help: Greatly boosts your attacks for a few seconds. Slightly increases chance to hit. Recharge: Long

Lightning_Clap.display_help: A focused electrical blast that can travel great distances with high Accuracy. Zapp drains Endurance, some of which may transfer back to you. This is a sniper attack, and is best fired from a distance, as it can be interrupted. If you are engaged in battle this attack becomes instant-cast. If you are not engaged, it will do bonus damage. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow

Thunder_Strike.display_help: Discharges a cone of Static Electricity that deals damage and drains Endurance from all affected foes in the area. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

Power_Sink.display_help: A massive attack. You smash your foes with all the power of a lightning bolt. The pummeled victim takes tremendous damage and may be Disoriented. Any nearby foes may be knocked down and take some damage from the shockwave. Damage: High, Recharge: Slow
Power_Sink.display_short_help: Melee (AoE), High DMG(Smash, Energy), Foe Disorient, Knockback

Shocking_Grasp.display_help: You can manifest a polarized electricity field that hovers above the ground and hurls bolts of electricity at nearby foes. Any enemy that passes near this Sentinel risks serious injury. The Sentinel is not alive and cannot be targeted or attacked by enemies. The Sentinel can fly and will follow you. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Very Long
Shocking_Grasp.display_short_help: Summon Sentinel: Ranged, Moderate DMG(Energy), Foe -End

Power_Bolt.display_help: A quick attack that rapidly hurls small bolts of energy at foes, sometimes knocking them down. If used against a Disoriented foe, there is a small chance to enter Energy Focus mode. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

Bone_Smasher.display_help: This melee attack can be slow, but it compensates by dealing a good amount of damage and having a good chance to Disorient the target. If used against a Disoriented foe, there is a small chance to enter Energy Focus mode. This power will weaken the target's secondary effects if used while in Energy Focus mode. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

Power_Push.display_help: Power Push deals a high amount of Energy and Smashing damage and sends the target flying for a great distance. If used against a Disoriented foe, there is a small chance to enter Energy Focus mode. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate
Power_Push.display_short_help: Ranged High DMG(Energy/Smash), Foe High Knockback

Power_Blast.display_help: A much more powerful, yet slower version of Power Bolt. Power Blast sends a focused beam of energy at a foe that can knock them back. If used against a Disoriented foe, there is a small chance to enter Energy Focus mode. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

Power_Boost.display_help: Boosts the damage and secondary effects of your powers. Your powers' effects like Heals, Defense Buffs, Endurance Drains, Disorients, Holds, Immobilizes and more, are all improved. The effects of Power Up last a short while, and only the next couple of attacks will be boosted. Recharge: Long

Whirling_Hands.display_help: By focusing your energy into the muscles in your arms, you can launch a dizzying flurry of attacks against every foe in melee range. Some foes may be hit hard enough to be Disoriented as well. This power will inflict bonus damage if used while in Energy Focus mode. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

Total_Focus.display_help: Total Focus is complete mastery over Energy Melee. This melee attack is a very slow, but incredibly devastating attack that can knock out most opponents, leaving them Disoriented. Due to the exhausting nature of Total Focus, recharge time is very long. This power will enter Energy Focus mode. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Long

Sniper_Blast.display_help: A focused blast that can travel great distances with high Accuracy. This is a sniper attack, and is best fired from a distance, as it can be interrupted. If you are engaged in battle this attack becomes instant-cast. If you are not engaged, it will do bonus damage. If used against a Disoriented foe, there is a small chance to enter Energy Focus mode. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow

Power_Burst.display_help: A devastating attack that can knock your target off their feet. This power will inflict bonus damage if used while in Energy Focus mode. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow

Flares.display_help: A quick attack that throws Flares at the target. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Very Fast
Flares.display_target_help: You are on fire and burning!

Incinerate.display_help: Intense concentration can allow you to Incinerate an opponent at melee range. This will set your foe ablaze, dealing damage over time. Damage: High(DoT), Recharge: Slow

Fire_Breath.display_help: You can breathe forth a torrent of fire that burns all foes within its narrow cone. Very accurate and very deadly at medium range. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Fire_Breath.display_target_help: You are on fire and burning!

Fire_Blast.display_help: Sends a Blast of Fire at a targeted foe and sets the target on fire for a short period of time. Slower recharge rate than Flares, but more damage. Damage: High, Recharge: Fast
Fire_Blast.display_target_help: You are on fire and burning!

Fiery_Embrace.display_help: Significantly boosts the damage of all your Fire attacks for quite a while. Also increases the damage of all your other non-fire based attacks for a short while. Recharge: Very Long
Fiery_Embrace.display_attacker_hit: You tap into your inner fire with your {PowerName} and now all your attacks are significantly more deadly.

Combustion.display_help: Your mastery of fire allows you to violently raise the temperature around yourself in an attempt to spontaneously combust any nearby foes and set them ablaze, dealing damage over time. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow

Consume.display_help: You can drain body heat from all nearby foes in order to replenish your own Endurance. The more foes affected, the more Endurance is gained. Foes suffer minimal Fire damage. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Long

Blazing_Bolt.display_help: A long range beam of fire that blasts your foes. This is a sniper attack, and is best fired from a distance, as it can be interrupted. If you are engaged in battle this attack becomes instant-cast. If you are not engaged, it will do bonus damage. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow
Blazing_Bolt.display_target_help: You are on fire and burning!

Blaze.display_help: A devastating flame attack. Damage: High, Recharge: Slow
Blaze.display_target_help: You are on fire and burning!

Ice_Bolt.display_help: Ice Bolt quickly pelts an enemy with small icy daggers; their chill Slows a foe's attacks and movement for a time. Fast, but little damage. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast
Ice_Bolt.display_target_help: Your Attack rate and Running speed are reduced by the Ice Bolt.

Ice_Sword.display_help: You create a blade of solid ice that deals good damage. Being hit by this Ice Sword will Slow a target's movement and attack speed, due to the intense chill. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Ice_Sword.display_target_help: You are chilled. Your Attack speed and Running speed are reduced.

Ice_Sword_Circle.display_help: Mastery of your Ice Sword has enabled you to make an attack on every foe within melee distance. This will slash and chill your enemies, dealing moderate damage and slowing all affected targets' movement and attack speed. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Ice_Sword_Circle.display_target_help: You are chilled. Your Attack speed and Running speed are reduced.

Ice_Blast.display_help: Ice Blast hurls shards of ice at foes and Slows their attacks and movement for a time. Slower recharge than Ice Bolt, but more damage. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Ice_Blast.display_target_help: Your Attack rate and Running speed are reduced by the Ice Blast.

Power_Boost.display_help: Boosts the damage and secondary effects of your powers. Your powers' effects like Heals, Defense Buffs, Endurance Drains, Disorients, Holds, Immobilizes and more, are all improved. The effects of Power Up last a short while, and only the next couple of attacks will be boosted. Recharge: Long

Frost_Breath.display_help: Unleashes a cone of frosty breath that can Slow your opponents' movement and attacks. Very accurate and very deadly at medium range. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Frost_Breath.display_target_help: You are freezing. Your Attack rate and Running speed are reduced by the Frost Breath.

Chilling_Embrace.display_help: While active, you dramatically lower the temperature around yourself, Slowing the attack rate of all nearby foes, as well as their damage and movement speed. The low air temperatures may also deal some damage over time to the snared foes. Recharge: Very Fast
Chilling_Embrace.display_target_help: Your Attack speed and Running speed are reduced by the Chilling Embrace.

Greater_Ice_Sword.display_help: Ice Slash allows the user to create a blade of solid ice and strike a foe for high damage. Being hit by Ice Slash will Slow a foes' attack and movement speed, due to the intense chill. Damage: High, Recharge: Slow
Greater_Ice_Sword.display_target_help: You are chilled. Your Attack speed and Running speed are reduced.

Bitter_Ice_Blast.display_help: A slower yet more powerful version of Ice Blast, Bitter Ice Blast deals much more damage and can also reduce your enemy's chance to hit. Like other Ice Blast powers, Bitter Ice Blast can Slow a target's movement and attack speed. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow
Bitter_Ice_Blast.display_target_help: Your chance to hit, Attack rate and Running speed are reduced by the Bitter Ice Bolt.

Shuriken_Throw.display_help: You impale your foe with a thrown shuriken, dealing moderate Lethal damage. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

Thunder_Kick.display_help: You can perform a strong Thunder Kick that hits so hard it can Disorient your target. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Moderate

Trick_Shot.display_help: You take careful aim and bounce a thrown shuriken between multiple targets. Note that Trick Shot is unaffected by Range changes. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Trick_Shot.display_target_help: You have been recently struck by a bouncing Trick Shot!

Spinning_Kick.display_help: You perform a high spinning reverse roundhouse kick, smashing anything in front of you with devastating force. You can activate this ability at any time, no matter what you have targeted; it will strike enemies directly in front of your character, rather than enemies near your target. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

Envenomed_Blades.display_help: You add a toxic venom to all of your attacks for a moderate duration. All damaging powers gain bonus Toxic damage. You also gain a moderate bonus to your chance to hit. Recharge: Long

Dragons_Tail.display_help: This low spinning kick deals slightly more damage than Thunder Kick, but has a chance to hit all enemies in melee range. Successful hits may trip and knock down your opponents. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Dragons_Tail.display_short_help: PBAoE Melee, Moderate DMG(Smash), Foe Knockdown

Caltrops.display_help: You toss a handful of Caltrops at a targeted location and spread the tiny metal spikes over a large area. Any villains that pass over the Caltrops will be forced to move at a slower rate. They will also take some trivial Lethal damage over time. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Caltrops.display_target_help: The Caltrops are damaging your feet. Your Running speed is reduced as a result.

Masterful_Throw.display_help: You take careful aim and let loose an extremely accurate, extremely forceful blade. This is a sniper attack, and is best fired from a distance, as it can be interrupted. If you are engaged in battle this attack becomes instant-cast. If you are not engaged, it will do bonus damage. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow

Explosive_Shuriken.display_help: You rig a shuriken with a powerful explosive, then send it flying towards your enemies. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow
Explosive_Shuriken.display_short_help: Ranged, Superior DMG(Fire), Minor Splash Damage (Fire DoT)

Psionic_Dart.display_help: This basic attack does moderate Psionic damage, and can slightly reduce a target's attack speed. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Psionic_Dart.display_target_help: The Psionic Dart has slowed your Attack rate.

Mind_Probe.display_help: Grip the minds of your foe with a Mind Probe. You must be in close proximity to pull off this attack that wrecks havoc on your foes synapses, dealing high Psionic Damage while reducing their attack speed. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate
Mind_Probe.display_target_help: The Mind Probe has slowed your Attack rate.

Telekinetic_Thrust.display_help: A focused attack of intense mental power that violently sends a nearby foe flying and deals a high amount of Psionic and Smashing damage. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

Mental_Blast.display_help: This basic attack does high Psionic damage, and can slightly reduce a target's attack speed. Damage: High, Recharge: Fast
Mental_Blast.display_target_help: The Mental Blast has slowed your Attack rate.

Psychic_Scream.display_help: This howl of Psionic energy resonates in the minds of all foes within its conical area of effect, inflicting moderate damage. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Psychic_Scream.display_target_help: The Psychic Scream has reduced your Attack rate.

Drain_Psyche.display_help: You Drain the Psyche of nearby foes, thus weakening their Hit Point Regeneration and Endurance Recovery and boosting your own. Recharge: Very Long

Subdue.display_help: Subdue deals high Psionic damage and may leave the targeted foe Immobilized for a brief time. Immobilized foes cannot move but can still attack. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Subdue.display_target_help: You have been Subdued and are being held immobile.

Psionic_Lance.display_help: This extremely long range Psionic attack has a bonus to Accuracy, and can Slow a target's attack rate. This is a sniper attack, and is best fired from a distance, as it can be interrupted. If you are engaged in battle this attack becomes instant-cast. If you are not engaged, it will do bonus damage. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow
Psionic_Lance.display_target_help: The Psionic Lance has reduced your Attack rate.

Psychic_Shockwave.display_help: Psychic Shockwave is a devastating Psionic attack that wracks the minds of all nearby foes. Affected foes may have a reduced attack rate and may be left Disoriented. Damage: Moderate Recharge: Slow
Psychic_Shockwave.display_target_help: The Psychic Wail has reduced your attack rate.

Neutrino_Bolt.display_help: A very quick, but low damage attack. Neutrino Bolt can reduce the target's Defense. Affected enemies have a small chance to be affected by the Contaminated effect. Hitting Contaminated foes with single target Radioactive Assault powers cause a small burst of damage to foes near the target. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast
Neutrino_Bolt.display_target_help: Your Defense has been reduced by the Neutrino Bolt.

Contaminated_Strike.display_help: You charge your fist with harmful radioactive particles and quickly strike your foe dealing Light Energy and Smashing damage as well as reducing their defense. Affected enemies have a small chance to be affected by the Contaminated effect. Hitting Contaminated foes with single target Radioactive Assault powers cause a small burst of damage to foes near the target. Damage: Light, Recharge: Very Fast
Contaminated_Strike.display_target_help: Your defense has been reduced by Contaminated Strike!

X-Ray_Beam.display_help: You can emit a beam of X-Ray energy from your eyes, dealing moderate Energy damage. This attack can bypass some defenses and can reduce the target's Defense. Affected enemies have a small chance to be affected by the Contaminated effect. Hitting Contaminated foes with single target Radioactive Assault powers cause a small burst of damage to foes near the target. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
X-Ray_Beam.display_target_help: Your Defense has been reduced by the X-Ray Beam.

Electron_Haze.display_help: A short range conical blast of free electrons. This attack can bypass some of a target's defenses and reduce the target's Defense. It can also knock some targets down. Affected enemies have a small chance to be affected by the Contaminated effect. Hitting Contaminated foes with single target Radioactive Assault powers cause a small burst of damage to foes near the target. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Electron_Haze.display_short_help: Close, Moderate Cone DMG(Energy), Foe -DEF, Knockback
Electron_Haze.display_target_help: The Electron Haze has reduced your Defenses.

Fusion.display_help: Fusion boosts your damage and chance to hit moderately and also causes your next few attacks to have a 100% chance to inflict Contaminated on your enemies. Recharge: Very Long

Radiation_Siphon.display_help: You pummel your foe with a deadly smashing attack dealing High Energy and Smashing damage and reducing their defense. Hitting Contaminated targets will also heal you for a large amount of health over 3 seconds and remove the Contaminated effect from the target. However, uncontaminated targets have a moderate chance to be affected by the Contaminated effect. Hitting Contaminated foes with single target Radioactive Assault powers cause a small burst of damage to foes near the target. Damage: High Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Radiation_Siphon.display_target_help: Your defense has been reduced by Radiation Siphon!

Atom_Smasher.display_help: You charge up a dangerously unstable amount of radioactive energy into a single fist before driving it into the ground and causing a small explosion. Foes caught in the blast will suffer High Energy and Toxic damage and have their defense reduced. Enemies also have a moderate chance to be disoriented for a short time. Affected enemies have a small chance to be affected by the Contaminated effect. Hitting Contaminated foes with single target Radioactive Assault powers cause a small burst of damage to foes near the target. Damage: High, Recharge: Long
Atom_Smasher.display_short_help: PBAoE, High DMG(Energy/Toxic), Foe -Def, Disorient, Special
Atom_Smasher.display_target_help: Your defense has been reduced by Atom Smasher!

Proton_Volley.display_help: Hurls a volley of alpha particles over an extremely long range. Proton Volley can bypass some of a target's defenses and reduce the target's Defense. This is a sniper attack, and is best fired from a distance as it can be interrupted. If you are engaged in battle this attack becomes instant-cast. If you are not engaged, it will do bonus damage. Affected enemies have a small chance to be affected by the Contaminated effect. Hitting Contaminated foes with single target Radioactive Assault powers cause a small burst of damage to foes near the target. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow
Proton_Volley.display_target_help: The Proton Volley has reduced your Defenses.

Devastating_Blow.display_help: You hammer your foe with a brutal smashing attack charged with a lethal dose of radiation. Your target will suffer Extreme Energy and Smashing damage, will have its defense reduced and will be disoriented for a short time. Devastating Blow has an increased change to critically hit. Affected enemies will be affected by the Contaminated effect. Hitting Contaminated foes with single target Radioactive Assault powers cause a small burst of damage to foes near the target. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Long
Devastating_Blow.display_short_help: Melee, Extreme DMG(Energy/Smash), Foe -Def, Disorient, Special

Call_Swarm.display_help: You summon a swarm of stinging insects to harass your foe causing Light Lethal damage over time and reducing both their movement speed and defense. This power grants 1 stack of Blood Frenzy. Damage: Light DoT, Recharge: Very Fast
Call_Swarm.display_short_help: Ranged, Light DoT(Lethal), Foe -Defense, -Speed, +1 Blood Frenzy
Call_Swarm.display_target_help: The swarm has reduced your defense and movement speed.

Maiming_Slash.display_help: You execute a savage slash at your foe's lower body causing moderate lethal damage and minor damage over time. The foe will also have their movement speed reduced moderately. Maiming Slash grants 1 stack of Blood Frenzy. Damage: Moderate, Minor DoT, Recharge: Fast
Maiming_Slash.display_short_help: Melee, Moderate DMG(Lethal), Minor DoT(Lethal), Foe -Speed, +1 Blood Frenzy
Maiming_Slash.display_target_help: Your movement speed has been reduced and you are bleeding!

Vicious_Slash.display_help: You tear at your foe with both hands dealing high lethal damage and causing minor lethal damage over time. Foes struck by this attack have a high chance to be knocked down. Vicious Slash grants 2 stacks of Blood Frenzy. Damage: High, Minor DoT, Recharge: Moderate
Vicious_Slash.display_short_help: Melee, High DMG(Lethal), Foe Minor DoT(Lethal), Knockdown, Self +2 Blood Frenzy

Call_Ravens.display_help: With a mighty roar, you command an unkindness of ravens to quickly assault and harass your foes. Your foes will suffer Moderate Lethal damage over time and have their speed and defense reduced. The power inflicts lethal damage over time that scales in strength with the number Blood Frenzy stacks. This power grants 2 stacks of Blood Frenzy. Damage: Moderate, Minor DoT, Recharge: Moderate
Call_Ravens.display_short_help: Ranged (Cone), Moderate DoT(Lethal), Foe -Speed, -Defense, -Fly, +2 Blood Frenzy

Spot_Prey.display_help: Greatly boosts your attacks for a few seconds. Slightly increases perception and chance to hit. Recharge: Long
Spot_Prey.display_attacker_hit: You tap into your senses core with your {PowerName} and are more accurate and more deadly for a short while.

Rending_Flurry.display_help: You wildly slash at nearby foes to deal moderate lethal damage and cause minor lethal damage over time. This power consumes all Blood Frenzy and will deal additional damage per stack of Blood Frenzy consumed. If you have 5 stacks of Blood Frenzy while activating this power, its radius is greatly increased, but causes you to become Exhausted for a short time. While exhausted you cannot gain Blood Frenzy. Damage: Moderate, Minor DoT, Recharge: Long
Rending_Flurry.display_short_help: PBAoE, Moderate DMG(Lethal), Foe Minor DoT(Lethal), -Blood Frenzy

Blood_Craze.display_help: You go into a blood craze, making you quickly shrug aside some of the damage received. Blood Craze will immediately heal you for a small amount and cause you to heal for a moderate amount of health over a short time seconds. Recharge: Very Long
Blood_Craze.display_target_help: You are recovering health over time due to your Blood Thirst.
Blood_Craze.display_attacker_hit: You take a moment to clear your head and recover from your wounds.

Call_Hawk.display_help: You call forth a hawk ally to swoop in and viciously peck at your target causing High Lethal damage. The attack often catches foes off their guard and can knock them down as well as reducing their chance to hit. This power's damage over time effect will scale with the number of stacks of Blood Frenzy. Using this power with 5 stacks of Blood Frenzy causes you to become Exhausted for a short time, but the duration of its damage over time effect is increased. While exhausted you cannot gain Blood Frenzy. Damage: High, Special DoT, Recharge: Slow
Call_Hawk.display_short_help: Ranged, High DMG (Lethal), Foe -To Hit, Knockdown, -Fly
Call_Hawk.display_target_help: Your chance to hit has been reduced by the Hawk's attack.

Feral_Charge.display_help: You throw yourself at your target while slashing and tearing wildly dealing moderate lethal damage and causing it to suffer from additional minor lethal damage over time. The damage of this power can increase based on how far away you charge from, with up to double damage dealt at its strongest. Feral Charge builds 1 stacks of Blood Frenzy for every 20 ft in between your target and you, up to 3 stacks. Damage: High, Minor DoT, Recharge: Long
Feral_Charge.display_short_help: Melee, High DMG(Lethal), Foe Minor DoT(Lethal), +3 Blood Frenzy, Self Teleport

Thorny_Darts.display_help: Hurls small Thorny Darts at your foes. Thorny Darts deal moderate damage. Poison from the Darts deals additional Toxic damage and can reduce your foes Defense. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Thorny_Darts.display_target_help: You are poisoned! You are taking Toxic Damage and your Defense is Reduced.

Skewer.display_help: You lunge forward with this melee attack and Skewer your foe with the large Thorn on your arm. Deals high damage and poisons your foe. Poison from the Thorns deals additional Toxic damage and can reduce your foes Defense. Damage: High, Recharge: Fast
Skewer.display_target_help: You are poisoned! You are taking Toxic Damage and your Defense is Reduced.

Fling_Thorns.display_help: You can throw dozens of Thorns in a wide cone in front of you, impaling foes caught within the area. These Thorns deals moderate damage, and poisons any targets it hits. Thorn poison deals additional Toxic damage and can reduce your foes' Defense. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Fling_Thorns.display_target_help: You are poisoned! You are taking Toxic Damage and your Defense is Reduced.

Impale.display_help: You can throw a small cluster of large Thorns at a targeted foe. These Thorns carry a large amount of the toxin. In addition to dealing Toxic damage, a successful attack can slow a target, preventing Running, Jumping or Flying. Most foes will likely be completely Immobilized, unable to run. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Impale.display_target_help: You are poisoned! Your Running speed is reduced and you may be immobilized and unable to run, jump or fly.

Aim.display_help: Greatly boosts your attacks for a few seconds. Slightly increases chance to hit. Recharge: Long
Aim.display_attacker_hit: You activate {PowerName} and increase the power of your next few attacks.

Thorn_Burst.display_help: You can explode dozens of Thorns in all directions around you. These Thorns only travel a short distance, but they can deal moderate damage and poison any target close to you. Toxic damage from the thorns can reduce the Defense of affected foes. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Thorn_Burst.display_target_help: You are poisoned! You are taking Toxic Damage and your Defense is Reduced.

Thorntrops.display_help: You fling dozens of Thorns into the ground at a targeted location. The small Thorns pepper the ground over a large area. Any enemy that pass over the Thorntrops will be forced to move at a slower rate. They will also take some trivial Lethal damage over time. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Thorntrops.display_target_help: The caltrops are causing minor damage to you and slowing your running speed.

Ripper.display_help: You can unleash a spectacular slashing maneuver that attacks all foes in a wide arc directly in front of you. Ripper deals massive damage and poisons multiple targets. It can even knock foes down. Thorn poison deals additional Toxic damage and can reduce your foes Defense. Damage: High, Recharge: Slow
Ripper.display_target_help: You are poisoned! You are taking Toxic Damage and your Defense is Reduced.

Thorn_Barrage.display_help: A devastating attack, Thorn Barrage unleashes your Thorns at high velocity causing severe damage at range. The impact of this attack can knock most foes on their back. Thorn poison deals additional Toxic damage and can reduce your foes Defense. Damage: High, Recharge: Slow
Thorn_Barrage.display_target_help: You are poisoned! You are taking Toxic Damage and your Defense is Reduced.
